item.title: ‘I’ve won affordability’: Trump previews SOTU in Georgia rally
item.description: The president stopped in Marjorie Taylor Greene’s old district to defend his economic record.

media:content.media:title: President Donald Trump speaks at Coosa Steel Corporation in Rome, Georgia, on Feb. 19.

item.dc:creator: By Aaron Pellish

item.title: Trump in Iowa tries to shift the conversation back to the economy
item.description: A brief swing through the farm state underscored administration fears about the midterms.

media:content.media:title: President Donald Trump acknowledges the crowd after speaking during an event at the Horizon Events Center in Clive, Iowa, Jan. 27, 2026.

item.dc:creator: By Megan Messerly

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

media:content.media:title: President Donald Trump has struggled to stay on message, and even Republicans say he hasn’t necessarily delivered on the economy.

item.dc:creator: By Gregory Svirnovskiy

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe
